turns.content:
Thank you for providing the additional information. With the information you've provided, I can provide an example of a letter that could be used to accompany an H-1B visa application for Ugne Karaliute.

[Employer Name]
[Employer Address]
[City, State ZIP Code]
[Employer Phone Number]
[Employer Email]

[Date]

United States Citizenship and Immigration Services
[USCIS Address]
[City, State ZIP Code]

Subject: H-1B Visa Petition for Ugne Karaliute

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to petition for the H-1B nonimmigrant visa classification for Ugne Karaliute, who will be working as a [insert job title] at [Employer Name]. Our company is in need of a highly skilled and qualified individual with expertise in [insert field of expertise], and we believe that Ugne is the perfect candidate for this position.

Ugne has a [insert degree level] degree in [insert field of study], which is directly relevant to the specialty occupation of [insert job title]. In addition, Ugne has [insert number] years of experience in [insert field of expertise] and has a solid track record of accomplishments in this field.

Ugne will be working on a full-time basis for [Employer Name] and will be responsible for [insert job duties]. Our company is committed to providing Ugne with a competitive salary and benefits package, and we will ensure that he is paid at least the actual or prevailing wage for the occupation, whichever is higher.

We are confident that Ugne will make a valuable contribution to our company and we look forward to welcoming him to the United States to begin working on this important project.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Employer Name]

Enclosures:

* Form I-129, Petition for a Nonimmigrant Worker
* Ugne Karaliute's resume and qualifications
* Evidence of the company's ability to pay the offered wage
* Labor Condition Application (LCA) certified by the U.S. Department of Labor
* Any other relevant supporting documents

Please note that this is just an example and may not be suitable for actual use. The information and documents needed for H-1B visa application can vary depending on the case, and it is always best to consult with an immigration lawyer or professional for further guidance and assistance.
You're welcome! Let me know if you have any other questions or need any further assistance with your H-1B application process.
That's fine. Of course you can just give me an example to help me to understand and follow the instruction correctly.

Sure, here is an example of how to fill out Form I-129 for an H-1B visa petition:

Petitioner Information:

* Legal Name of Petitioner: ABC Company
* Mailing Address: 123 Main St, Suite 200, Anytown USA 12345
* Telephone Number: [555-555-5555](ntouch://call/555-555-5555 "Call 555-555-5555 using Sorenson VRS")
* Email Address: [info@abccompany.com](mailto:info@abccompany.com)

Beneficiary Information:

* Legal Name of Beneficiary: Ugne Karaliute
* Date of Birth: 01/01/1990
* Country of Birth: Lithuania
* Country of Citizenship: Lithuania
* Passport Number: LT1234567
* Current Nonimmigrant Status (if applicable): N/A

Basis for Classification:

* Check box for "New employment"
* Check box for H-1B classification

Specialty Occupation:

* Position Title: Graphic Designer
* Description of Duties: Creating designs and layouts for various marketing materials, such as brochures, flyers, and digital advertisements. Utilizing software such as Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.
* Minimum Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or related field
* Beneficiary's Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design from Northampton College, with experience in creating designs for various marketing materials using Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.

Wage and Labor Condition Information:

* Prevailing Wage: $70,000 per year, as determined by the U.S. Department of Labor
* Beneficiary's Salary: $70,000 per year, as offered by ABC Company
* Labor Condition Application Number: 1234567890

Supporting Documents:

* Copy of Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design from Northampton College
* Copies of previous work experience in Graphic Design
* Copy of Labor Condition Application certified by the U.S. Department of Labor

The petitioner (ABC Company) would then need to sign and date the form, pay the appropriate filing fee, and submit the completed form and supporting documents to the appropriate USCIS office.
Can you give me an example of how a completed I-129 form with the information about Ugne I just gave to you.

Sure, here's an example of how a completed I-129 form for Ugne Karaliute might look like:

Form I-129
Petition for Nonimmigrant Worker

1. Legal Name of Petitioner: [Your Company Name]
2. Mailing Address: [Your Company Address]
3. Telephone Number: [Your Company Telephone Number]
4. Email Address: [Your Company Email Address]
5. Basis for Classification: H-1B
6. Beneficiary Information:
a. Family Name: Karaliute
b. Given Name: Ugne
c. Date of Birth: [Ugne's Date of Birth]
d. Country of Birth: Lithuania
e. Gender: [Ugne's Gender]
f. Passport Number: [Ugne's Passport Number]
g. Country of Issuance: Lithuania
h. Alien Registration Number (if any): N/A
i. U.S. Social Security Number (if any): N/A
j. U.S. Postal Service Address:
Street Number and Name: 4909 Hine Dr.
City or Town: Shady Side
State: MD
Zip Code: 20764
k. Telephone Number: 5088165476
l. Email Address: [karal.ugne@gmail.com](mailto:karal.ugne@gmail.com)
7. Employment Information:
a. Job Title: [Your job title for Ugne]
b. Description of Duties: [A detailed description of the duties Ugne will be performing]
c. Educational and/or Specialized Knowledge Requirements: [Ugne's qualifications and skills that are required for the position]
d. Salary: [Ugne's salary]
e. Will the beneficiary be employed on a full-time or part-time basis? Full-time
f. Start Date: [The start date of Ugne's employment]
g. End Date: [The end date of Ugne's employment]
8. Labor Condition Application (LCA) Information:
a. LCA Number: [The LCA number issued by the Department of Labor]
b. Date of LCA Filing: [The date the LCA was filed
